headers.name: Content-Security-Policy
headers.value: default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://unpkg.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://esm.sh; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data: https://cdn.iconscout.com https://placehold.co;
